page.title: 06Housing in our area
page.content: Our area used to be farmland e.g: Caereithin farm.There were also collieries here e.g: Mynydd Newydd. Before the big estates were built,the area developed along Linear lines. Middle Road was built up in 1933 with brick semi-detached houses.These houses would have seven rooms. People needed housing quickly after the war.The council built prefabricated houses for them.These houses were in Fordd-y-Brain,Heol Awstin and Rodfar Brain. Council estates consisting of terraced and semi detached were made in 1953. They had tile roofs and metal windows. The houses have six rooms inside.The area could have been better planned because there is not much open space.Maes-a-Felyn and Pant-yr-Helyg are now open plan development
